question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of International Youth Day (IYD)?
explanation: The International Youth Day (IYD) is observed every year on 12th of August  to raise awareness of challenges and problems facing the world’s youth. The day reiterate our pledge to make education inclusive, equitable & relevant to the changing dynamics of 21st century to prepare our youths to be future ready. The 2019 theme “Transforming education”  highlights efforts to make education more relevant, equitable and inclusive for all youth, including efforts by youth themselves.
